author: Master_Wu
title: A great book!
review:
Secret World Of The Ninja is a very fun book which I thoroughly enjoyed throughout the whole thing!

Inside the book are some facts about some of the characters, vehicles and weapons from Ninjago. It also includes some very fun pages featuring callbacks to different scenes throughout the show from seasons one to four! The minifigure included in this book is highly detailed and great for play or display!

Overall I'd say it is a good price for a great book and minifigure and I recommend you to buy it!
